name: Longsword
description: A longsword is a versatile weapon with a double-edged blade, designed for both cutting and thrusting. It is commonly used by knights and warriors.

name: Shortsword
description: A shortsword is a light, versatile weapon with a double-edged blade, typically used for thrusting and slashing in close combat.

name: Greatsword
description: A greatsword is a massive, two-handed sword with a long, double-edged blade designed for powerful slashing attacks. It requires great strength and skill to wield effectively.

name: Battleaxe
description: A battleaxe is a large, double-bladed axe designed for combat, capable of delivering powerful slashing attacks.

name: Greataxe
description: A greataxe is a large, double-bladed axe designed for powerful, sweeping attacks. It requires two hands to wield effectively and is known for its ability to deal devastating damage.

name: Mace
description: A mace is a blunt weapon with a heavy, metal head mounted on a sturdy wooden or metal shaft, designed for delivering powerful and crushing blows in close combat.

name: Spear
description: A spear is a pole weapon consisting of a shaft, usually of wood, with a pointed head. It can be used for thrusting in melee combat or thrown as a ranged weapon.

name: Dagger
description: A dagger is a small, easily concealable weapon with a sharp point and edges, designed for stabbing or thrusting in close combat.

name: Rapier
description: A rapier is a slender, sharply pointed sword, designed primarily for thrusting attacks. It is known for its speed and precision in combat.

name: Scimitar
description: A scimitar is a curved, single-edged sword known for its sharpness and ability to deliver swift, slashing attacks. It is often used by skilled swordsmen and is favored for its agility in combat.

name: Flail
description: A flail is a weapon consisting of a spiked or knobbed head attached to a handle by a chain, allowing for powerful and unpredictable strikes.

name: Morningstar
description: A morningstar is a spiked club with a heavy, metal head covered in spikes, designed to inflict both bludgeoning and piercing damage in close combat.

name: Halberd
description: A halberd is a two-handed pole weapon that consists of an axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft, with a hook or thorn on the back side of the axe blade for grappling mounted combatants.

name: Club
description: A club is a simple, blunt weapon made from a sturdy piece of wood, designed for delivering powerful, crushing blows in close combat.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A quarterstaff is a long, sturdy wooden staff, often used as a walking stick or a weapon. It is versatile and can be wielded with one or both hands.

name: Falchion
description: A falchion is a one-handed, single-edged sword with a slightly curved blade, designed for powerful slashing attacks.
